inclusion.criterion: No asthma or asthma medication in the last 2 years
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Smartphone possession (parents or participants) with ability of internet connection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed written consent (parents, parents & children >12 years old)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cohort B. Children and adolescents with asthma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Major respiratory events (e.g., severe respiratory infection, chest trauma) or other health-related events that may hamper the performance of lung function measurements (e.g., surgery, trauma) within the 3-month period of observation
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has asthma and is currently using inhaled corticosteroid and fluticasone. However, he meets some inclusion criteria and does not meet any other exclusion criteria.
